name: Jade Rousseau: The Secret Revelations - The Fall of Sant' Antonio
name_original: Jade Rousseau: The Secret Revelations - The Fall of Sant' Antonio
description:
Jade Rousseau: The Secret Revelations - The Fall of Sant' Antonio is a game developed by Deck13 Interactive. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Masque Publishing.
Jade Rousseau: The Secret Revelations - The Fall of Sant' Antonio is available on PC.
